name: CAShapeLayer
desc: A layer that draws a cubic Bezier spline in its coordinate space.

items.name: var path: CGPath?
items.desc: The path defining the shape to be rendered. Animatable.

items.name: var fillColor: CGColor?
items.desc: The color used to fill the shape’s path. Animatable.

items.name: var fillRule: CAShapeLayerFillRule
items.desc: The fill rule used when filling the shape’s path.

items.name: var lineCap: CAShapeLayerLineCap
items.desc: Specifies the line cap style for the shape’s path.

items.name: var lineDashPattern: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The dash pattern applied to the shape’s path when stroked.

items.name: var lineDashPhase: CGFloat
items.desc: The dash phase applied to the shape’s path when stroked. Animatable.

items.name: var lineJoin: CAShapeLayerLineJoin
items.desc: Specifies the line join style for the shape’s path.

items.name: var lineWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: Specifies the line width of the shape’s path. Animatable.

items.name: var miterLimit: CGFloat
items.desc: The miter limit used when stroking the shape’s path. Animatable.

items.name: var strokeColor: CGColor?
items.desc: The color used to stroke the shape’s path. Animatable.

items.name: var strokeStart: CGFloat
items.desc: The relative location at which to begin stroking the path. Animatable.

items.name: var strokeEnd: CGFloat
items.desc: The relative location at which to stop stroking the path. Animatable.
